## Source: google-open-source-security (bdc043b163e4ec6acada5d376a6a7becb3bba51c2b25307833500ec9fd8e1c4f)
This package is malicious and allows an attack remote code execution on
Windows and Linux machines. The package termncolor uses colorinal as a
dependency. The package colorinal contains the malicious behavior.
